summary: Siddharth Abimanyu, an influential scientist, is involved in various illegal medical practices. Mithran, an efficient IPS officer, decides to expose him.
cast: Jayam Ravi|Arvind Swamy|Nayanthara|Nassar|Ganesh Venkatraman|Thambi Ramaiah|Mugdha Godse|Vamsi Krishna|Harish Uthaman|Sricharan|Rahul Madhav|Abhinaya|Nagineedu|Anil Murali|Madhusudhan Rao|Saiju Kurup|Sanjana Singh|V. Jayaprakash|Junior Balaiya|Sriranjani|Maha Gandhi|Sharad K.R.G.|Markus Waldow|Dr. Kingmoohan|Susie Guerson
title: Thani Oruvan
